Text: What the hell is up with a multi-part archive in a torrent? I appreciate the torrent, but I'm sure you'd had unpacked it to actually view or at very least validate this content. I'm sure more people would appreciate a single file.
They do this with all of their torrents.  They must think torrents = usenet.  Or they think that tightly compressed file + more compression = yet more compression.  I can't decide.
